fn.p: The best way to achieve this is through diagnosis in the doctor's office, with guidelines that encourage widespread screening and mandatory coverage for testing.
“Cases”, as measured regionally, are defined as symptomatic patients, hospitalized or outpatient.

There have been a few reports of a few healed persons with negative PCR, in whom positive PCRs were found within 15 days, but without clinical signs, which led to erroneous conclusions (these may be false negatives.
Cf. e.g. the mathematical analyses in references [9] and [10].

A company scanning with artificial intelligence methods of official and unofficial sites in all languages was able to extract from the noise the signal of an emerging epidemic in China before official announcements and from air traffic to predict its expansion locations ( https://www.academic.oup.com/jtm/article/27/2/taaa008/5704418).
